name: TinyTanks!
description:
TinyTanks! is a demo PC game that is heavily inspired from the 9th game in Wii Play.

Control a tank that has only one mission : destroy every tank on sight.

This is still in development. We have bunch of ideas to go on and to make it more original with news mechanics, challenges and levels.

Features:

■ New pleasant way to play

Discover a gameplay that is simple and yet enjoyable, and try again while using cameras such as first person or third person. Maybe you will be even faster to finish levels ;)

■ Nostalgia and relaxation

Accurate to its predecessor, replay one of the most markable and nostalgic Wii Play game on PC. 

■ Atmospheric soundtrack

Each action has its own sound effect that makes the game more fancy.

■ Average playtime: 15 min
